description: Try our easy to follow Tuna Rice Paper Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tuna Rice Paper Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour boiling water into a shallow dish big enough to fit rice paper. Cool slightly.
Meanwhile, blanch broccolini in a saucepan of boiling water until tender but still firm. Remove and cool slightly. Slice stalks lengthways.

To assemble rolls, dip 1 rice paper into the shallow dish, turning, until completely wet. Remove and lay on a flat surface. Place lettuce, avocado, spring onion, tuna, snow pea and broccolini across the round towards the bottom. Fold over bottom, to cover filling, and both sides in, then roll up tightly. Repeat with remaining rice paper and filling.
Combine sauce and juice in a bowl (see tip). Serve sauce with rolls.
